title: The wall & glory of Jerusalem, in a sermon preached in St. Pauls-Church London, before the Right Honorable the Lord Mayor, Lord General, aldermen, Common Council, and companies of the Honorable City of London, February 28. 1659. Being a day of solemn thanksgiving unto God, for restoring the Parliament and Common Council, and for preserving the City. By Edward Reynolds D.D.
author: Reynolds, Edward, 1599-1676.
publisher: printed by Tho: Newcomb, for George Thomason, at the Rose and Crown in St. Pauls Church-yard,
